comment.text: This text describes the permissions granted for a document, specifically indicating the user can view, edit, and comment. It appears in the UI to explain the level of access a user has to a document. Translators should ensure the description accurately reflects the granted permissions.

usage.context:
{ fileType: FileType.Document, access: ShareAccessRights.FullAccess },
 () => t("Common:FullAccessDescriptionDocument"),
 )
 .with(
 { fileType: FileType.Document, access: ShareAccessRights.Editing },
 () => t("Common:EditingDescriptionDocument"),
 )
 .with(
 { fileType: FileType.Document, access: ShareAccessRights.Review },
 () => t("Common:ReviewDescriptionDocument"),
 )
